article_title: California homeowner has too much water
article_text:
The United States' first known case of a superbug that cannot be killed by any existing antibiotic was announced Thursday by the U.S. Department of Defense.

Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Director Dr. Tom Frieden announced the case at the ...

og.description: For more than a year now, a mystery source of water has been bubbling up out of the ground and flowing down the street in Carmel, Calif., and there's no sign it will stop anytime soon.
